PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-12122018-09-28,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  AAFC
ActFarm Income Protection Act
SubjectOrder providing Financial Assistance under the Federal-provincial-territorial AgriRecovery Framework to British Columbia agricultural producers
PrecisOrder authorizing Minister of Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada to enter into an AGREEMENT with the province of BRITISH COLUMBIA to provide federal contributions of up to $3.0 million under the Agricultural Disaster Relief Program (AgriRecovery) to assist affected agricultural producers with the extraordinary costs related to the 2018 wildfires.
RegistrationRegistration: UNR/
AttachmentsAttachment
